item.description: Golang çš„ Map ä¸ä½†æ˜¯ æ— åº çš„ï¼Œè€Œä¸”è¿˜æ˜¯ éçº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨çš„ã€‚ è¯»å†™é” å®ç°çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨ map ğŸ”—å®šä¹‰ ğŸ”—type SafeMap struct { mu sync.RWMutex m map[string]int } func NewSafeMap() *SafeMap { return &SafeMap{ m: make(map[string]int), } } func (sm *SafeMap) Get(key string) (int, bool) { sm.mu.RLock() defer sm.mu.RUnlock() val, ok := sm.m[key] return val, ok } func (sm *SafeMap) Set(key string, value int) { sm.mu.Lock() defer sm.mu.Unlock() sm.m[key] = value } ä½¿ç”¨ ğŸ”—safeMap := NewSafeMap() // è¯»æ“ä½œ val, ok := safeMap.
